description: This is a standalone Fortran code (mie_scat) that calculates the mie scattering cross sections, absorption cross sections, and efficiency coefficients of dust grains. It includes a separate file (miegrn) that functions as a wrapper function between PHOENIX (a proprietary radiative transfer code to model stellar atmospheres) and the mie scattering calculations. Miegrn works to determine the input parameters for mie_scat and then feeds the resultant data back into PHOENIX.
name: mie_scat
